title: 5 Ways Behavioral Analytics is Revolutionizing Incident Response
description: Behavioral analytics, long associated with threat detection (i.e. UEBA or UBA), is experiencing a renaissance. Once primarily used to identify suspicious activity, itâ€™s now being reimagined as a powerful post-detection technology that enhances incident response processes.
